amendment.description: Amendments clarify language which provides $200 million for "comprehensive school reform".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to broaden the definition of provisions in the bill making available $200 million for "whole school reform" grant money to clarify that funds shall be available for all "comprehensive school reform" approaches that meet State content and performance standards.

action.text: On agreeing to the Riggs amendments (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
